sentences.cn: 一部有趣但老套的电影

sentences.en: But the only thing predictable about life is its unpredictability.
sentences.cn: 对于人生而言,我们唯一可以预知的,就是其不可预知性.

sentences.en: Changes in the stock market are, of course, highly un - predictable .
sentences.cn: 股票市场的变化当然是 变幻莫测.

sentences.en: Demand for industrial salt is steady and predictable.
sentences.cn: 工业盐需求是稳定且可预测的。

sentences.en: Lumber production and total production occurred in predictable ratios to one another.
sentences.cn: 因为木材生产量与总产量之间出现了可预测的比例关系.

sentences.en: Perhaps I had misjudged him, and he was not so predictable after all.
sentences.cn: 也许我看错了他，毕竟他不是可以让人一眼看透的人。

sentences.en: Psychological twists perk up an otherwise predictable story line.
sentences.cn: 心理转折使原本老套的故事情节变得生动有趣。

sentences.en: Some of his first moves were predictable.
sentences.cn: 他最初的一些做法是可以预料得到的.

sentences.en: The complex Soviet system craves predictable partners.
sentences.cn: 复杂的苏联体制需要可以预测的对手.

sentences.en: The concert was a predictable yawn.
sentences.cn: 果不其然，那场音乐会很乏味。

sentences.en: The cost of litigation will be more affordable and predictable.
sentences.cn: 诉讼费将更注重民众经济能力,更具有可能预见性.

sentences.en: The ending of the book was entirely predictable.
sentences.cn: 那本书的结局完全是可以想见的。
这个结果完全在预料之中。

sentences.en: The rocks here are igneous and do not fracture along predictable lines.
sentences.cn: 这儿的石头都是火成岩,石头的裂缝极不规则.

sentences.en: The snow had a predictable effect on traffic.
sentences.cn: 这场雪对交通造成的影响可以预见。

sentences.en: Until the most recent series of test, results had been predictable.
sentences.cn: 直到最近,测试的结果一直是事先可以预料的.

sentences.en: What is most distressing is how predictable all of this was.
sentences.cn: 令人最烦恼的就是如何提前预知这些.

words.tran_cn: 作出预言；作预料，作预报

trans.tran_cn: 可预言的，可预报的，可预见的，可预料的
trans.tran_en: if something or someone is predictable, you know what will happen or what they will do – sometimes used to show disapproval
